info.title: SkillFundz API
info.description: API documentation for SkillFundz platform - connecting entrepreneurs with sponsors

get.description: Get paginated list of users with filtering capabilities

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in first_name, last_name, or email

message.example: You do not have permission to view users

post.description: Create a new admin-managed resource (Admin only)

get.description: Get detailed information of a user by ID. Admin can view any user, regular users can view their own profile.

message.example: You do not have permission to view this user

put.description: Update a specific user's details. Admins can update any user, regular users can update their own information.

message.example: You do not have permission to update this user

delete.description: Delete a specific user. Only admins can delete users, and they cannot delete themselves.

message.example: You cannot delete your own account
You do not have permission to delete users

get.description: Retrieve all users assigned to a specific role with pagination

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The role name to filter users by

message.example: You do not have permission to view users

404.description: Role not found or no users with this role

message.example: No users found with the specified role

get.summary: Get proposal creation form data (Only admins and sponsors can access this endpoint).
get.description: Retrieve available proposal statuses and user role information for proposal creation form. Only admins and sponsors can access this endpoint.

available_statuses.description: List of available proposal statuses based on user role

403.description: Unauthorized - Only admins and sponsors can access

get.description: Retrieve proposals based on user role - entrepreneurs see their own, sponsors see approved ones, admins see all

post.description: Create a new funding proposal (entrepreneurs only)

description.example: Revolutionary app that solves real-world problems

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific proposal

put.summary: Update proposal (entrepreneurs for their own, admins for any)
put.description: Update proposal details (entrepreneurs for their own, admins for any)

delete.summary: Delete proposal (entrepreneurs for their own, admins for any)
delete.description: Soft delete a proposal (entrepreneurs for their own, admins for any)

get.description: Retrieve list of all available proposal statuses

post.description: Sends a password reset link to the user's registered email address
Reset user password using the token sent via email

get.description: Returns the profile details of the currently logged in user including roles and permissions.

put.description: Update the profile information of the currently authenticated user. Users can update their personal details and optionally change their password by providing the current password.

requestBody.description: Profile update data - all fields are optional

400.description: Bad Request - Current password is incorrect

email: The email has already been taken.
phone_number: The phone number has already been taken.
current_password: The current password field is required when password is present.

post.description: Allows the authenticated user to change their password by providing current password and new password with confirmation

new_password_confirmation.description: Confirmation of new password (must match new_password)

current_password: The current password field is required.
new_password: The new password field is required.
The new password must be at least 8 characters.
new_password_confirmation: The new password confirmation does not match.

post.description: Upload and update the authenticated user's profile avatar image

avatar.description: Avatar image file (JPEG, PNG, JPG, GIF - max 2MB)
Path to the uploaded avatar image

avatar: The avatar must be an image.
The avatar must be a file of type: jpeg, png, jpg, gif.
The avatar may not be greater than 2048 kilobytes.

post.description: Authenticate a user with email and password, returns JWT token and user information

email: The email must be a valid email address.

post.description: Logs out the currently authenticated user and invalidates their session

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

post.description: Validates user authentication credentials and returns verification status
Resends a previously sent verification email, SMS, or other notification message to the user

identifier.description: Email address or phone number to resend to

429.description: Too many requests - Rate limit exceeded

error.example: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
